name: X Crystals
description:
Your rocket doesn't have enough power to make it back to the station. Gather colorful shiny crystals from around this small weird planet to repair it and go back home in one piece. You'll go through fights with aliens, hard jumps, and some combination of those two. Make sure not to jump too much and don't waste time, they're both limited.

(Made for the Beginners Circle  3 game jam)

W-A-S-D : Movement

Space : Jump

Left-Click : Attack

Don't get hit by green aliens too much. And get the colorful crystals on the edges of the planet.
